Valid point. But won't the contents of the DB and the current state of the application be exported by the end of the season anyways..?

If not, I'd suggest to approach it sorta like we did it when deprecating other application attributes last year: rename the column, prefix it with `deprecated_<original-name>` so that we know we can throw it out at some point.

However I'd still get rid of the logic inside the app related to this attribute - cause this looks like unused code to me then 🚜
